extensionAdditionalInfo.info: This extension contains an action that runs the Rake build tool.
extensionAdditionalInfo.actionInfo:
Runs the Rake build tool allowing you to specify the Rake script to run, the tasks to run, and optionally provide environment variables for the build script.

Action Fields

Rake Executable Path

The path to the Rake executable.

Rake File

The optional Rake File to use, relative to the working directory.

Tasks

Enter the tasks to run, separated by spaces.

Environment Variables

You may optionally specify additional environment variables and values for this execution, separated by newlines. For example:
opt1=value1
opt2=value2
